title: DG Hill Winter Thermal Socks - Warm Socks for Men Women Cold Weather Insulated Sock - Heated Socks Thick Snow Sock
description: 2 or 4 Pack Thermal Winter Socks: DG Hill thermal socks are thick warm socks for cold weather, 7x times warmer than cotton that interior is lined with plush brushed fleece makes cozy and soft on our feet. The insulating thermal yarn traps heat and keeps feet warm thus perfect cold weather boots socks for men women, have superior heat retention also suitable for winter outdoor insulated socks for hunting, skiing, hiking etc.

Moisture Wicking Technology: These heated socks are designed with moisture wicking material that keeps our feet dry and warm, reduces odor and maintains comfort throughout the day. Winter socks are daily necessity for every family and our long warm socks are good choices for winter extreme cold weather.

Double Thick Warm Socks: The long thick knit socks have superior cushioning in the footbed to maintain comfort even after long hours on our feet. Calf-length fleece socks with a ribbed stay up top so socks don't slip down and let the cold in. Ideal thermal socks for men women for relaxing at home or as comfortable boots socks snow socks while trail outside.

Long Lasting Quality: DG Hill thermal socks softer than wool socks, 3 sizes S/M/L choosable for men women kids, warm fuzzy socks have heavily brushed fleece lining for superior softness and comfort. Cozy heated thermals cradle our feet with softness, made with superior quality thick yarns, fleece socks packs washable and durable, support machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low heat.

Thick Socks Variety Packs: Pack with 2 or 4 pairs, with unisex sizes S/M/L and several styles and colors available for selection. For a general sizes suggestion that Small: Kids shoe size 3-5, Womens 5-7; Medium: Mens shoe size 4-8, Womens 6-10; Large: Mens shoe size 9-12, Womens 11-13; also can choose right size base on our own experience. Sock's material is 93% acrylic, 6% polyester and 1% spandex.
